MAIN_MESSAGE: Due to extreme weather conditions caused by high winds we have sustained  damage to our network. Our engineers are currently assessing the damage and when it is safe to commence repairs will make every effort to restore supplies as quickly and safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:00PM and we will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 6:10AM on 11th March 2021
